titles.title: Unto Him be glory in the church

comments.comment:
verse 1 (or 2) verse 2 (or 1)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unto Him be glory in the church
both now and evermore
Unto Him be glory in the church
both now and evermore

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unto Him, unto Him, unto Him, unto Him
Unto Him be glory in the Church
Both now and evermore
